name: Rush, Fumble, and Chomp (LD45)
description: You are a brand new baby Venus flytrap (Dionaea muscipula) and you are hungry for flies! But beware: there’s a bunch of guinea pigs on the loose, and they’re coming to knock you off your sunny perch. Use the arrow keys or WASD to dodge piggies and the space bar to chomp at flies. See how long you can last!! (Exit the application with Q)
